name: Barrel Buster
description:
Barrel Buster

==- Game Controls -==

  • wasd or arrowkeys - Movement.
  • Space - Punch. Punch a barrel to move it or a bomb to light it up.
  • E - Bomb pickup mode, in this mode punch a bomb to pick it up. Once picked up press E again to fire a row of flames.

-- Tips --

  • Be wary of dark holes in the ground.
  • Always make sure to send barrels to their end.
  • Pink fire does not kill you.

-- Unlockables --

  • Try setting honorable records and you might get a surprise unlockable in the Quests tab

==--------------------==

All pixel art, coding, and most of the sound effects were made by me. First time in game development field.
